Packages
org.dotplot Contains the basic DotplotCreator class.
org.dotplot.fileutil Classes for file handling.
org.dotplot.fmatrix F-Matrix classes.
org.dotplot.fmatrix.profiler The Profiler.
org.dotplot.fmatrix.test Tests.
org.dotplot.fmatrix.test.performance Tests.
org.dotplot.grid Integration of the grid framework into the plugin.
org.dotplot.grid.framework The grid framework used by the plugin.
org.dotplot.image Contains all classes needed for the imaging module.
org.dotplot.plugin The core of the Plugin.
org.dotplot.plugin.preferences configured plot. under construction...
org.dotplot.tests Tests.
org.dotplot.tokenizer Tokenizer classes.
org.dotplot.tokenizer.exceptions Exception handling for the tokenizer module.
org.dotplot.tokenizer.scanner Scanner classes.
org.dotplot.tokenizer.tests Tests.
org.dotplot.tokenizer.tokenfilter Filter classes.
org.dotplot.ui Provides the plugin-typical perspective.
org.dotplot.ui.actions Provides the actions to plot and to configure a plot and related classes.
org.dotplot.ui.actions.contextMenu Action wrappers for the dotplot context menu.
org.dotplot.ui.configuration Contains the configuration panels for the internal configuration framework.
org.dotplot.ui.configuration.controller Controllers for the configuration framework.
org.dotplot.ui.configuration.controller.tests Tests.
org.dotplot.ui.configuration.views Views for the configuration framework.
org.dotplot.ui.monitor Classes for the progress monitor.
org.dotplot.ui.views Holds all GUI relevant classes: complete views, label providers and supporting classes.
